Our Great National Parks

2022 | 1 Season | Documentaries

Narrated by former President Barack Obama, this stunning docuseries shines the spotlight on some of the planet's most spectacular national parks.

Our Great National Parks | Final Trailer | Netflix

An epic five-part series narrated by Barack Obama that invites viewers to celebrate and discover the power of our planet’s greatest national parks and wild spaces.

Our Great National Parks | Kenya + Netflix Sustainability Efforts

As part of Netflix’s commitment to environmental sustainability, we are working to protect and regenerate natural ecosystems around the world by decarbonizing our economy while restoring these life support systems.
